text: So ce dūto taṃ bhikkhuniṃ upasaṅkamitvā evaṃ vadeyya idaṃ kho ayye ayyaṃ uddissa cīvaracetāpannaṃ ābhataṃ paṭiggaṇhātāyyā cīvaracetāpanna nti
edit: So ce dūto taṃ bhikkhuniṃ upasaṅkamitvā evaṃ vadeyya idaṃ kho ayye ayyaṃ uddissa cīvaracetāpannaṃ ābhataṃ paṭiggaṇhātāyyā cīvaracetāpanna nti

translations.transtext: If the messenger, approachingthe bhikkhunī, should say, "This is a robe fund being delivered for the sake of the lady. May the lady accept this robe fund,"
